Detailed Description

The abstract superclass, which all our sprites inherit from.

SDL_Surface *  image,

Takes a surface and applies it to our screen surface.

Parameters:
x x coordinate where surface should be applied.
y y coordinate where surface should be applied.
image the image which should be applied to screen
screen takes the screen surface which is applied to.

Loads a image to our surface (like screen).

void Sprite::move ( const int  direction  )  [virtual]

This function is only used in Snake class, moves sprite.

Parameters:
current_direction takes a direction the sprite should be moved. 1 for UP, 2 for LEFT, 3 for DOWN, 4 for RIGHT.

Reimplemented in Snake.

std::map< std::string, SDL_Surface * > Sprite::image_buffer [static, private]
